CustomField.description: Checking this field removes non-essential processing such as filtering out fields that don't need to be updated. Leave this unchecked if you only want rollups to be processed where a change was actually made to the source field. However, enabling this setting does not guarantee the limiting of pre-processing, as other conditions can necessitate that pre-processing occurs. Some examples are if the source object is a knowledge article, or the source object has custom formula fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Leave this unchecked if you only want rollups / records to be processed where a change was actually made to the source field. Removes non-essential processing such as filtering out fields that don't need to be updated (Can help w/ Timeout issues).
CustomField.label: Limit Pre Processing
